entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 1:17 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: WNW 33 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
